<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Dealer Newsletter - April 2020
NEWS BRIEFS
BREAKING NEWS: AeroCruze 230 Awarded EASA Certification This approval opens the doors for over 35 airframes to upgrade their KFC 150 autopilots to increase efficiency and safety within the European general aviation markets. Read Announcement>> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/blogs/2020/april/aerocruze-230-receives-stc-from-easa]]>
Please contact your BendixKing Area Sales Manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> with any questions.
BendixKing Partners of the Year Announced BendixKing named three Partners of the Year this week based on their commitments to the quality of the BendixKing brand. Scandinavian Avionics was named our Global Partner of the Year. Duncan Aviation is our Partner of the Year for the Americas, and Hawker Pacific is our Asia-Pacific Partner of the Year. Congratulations to these partners, and we thank them for their hard work in supporting us over the past year. Find Your Repair Partner>> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/repair-partners]]>
OTHER NEWS: AeroCruze 100 Support and Repair Mid Continent Instruments is our exclusive source for AeroCruze 100 and xCruze (formerly TruTrak Vizion) autopilot repair and support. Please find their contact information on our website <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-100]]> for both their Kansas and California locations.
FEATURED PRODUCT INTRODUCING AEROPANEL 100 INTERCOM/AUDIO PANEL AeroPanel 100 is a convenient slide-in replacement for the BendixKing KMA 30. The music and Bluetooth capability provide unsurpassed audio flexibility throughout your airplane, and the 30-second digital recorder lets you play back any missed communications. AeroPanel 100 makes it simple to control audio throughout the aircraft including two music sources, 6-place intercom, and multiple audio inputs. Product Page>> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropanel]]>

SHOWS & EVENTS
Due to state and local governments current restrictions on public gatherings, in-person events and shows for April and May have been postponed or cancelled.
We’re coming up with ways to keep in touch with you in some non-traditional ways, such as the product and support videos (mentioned above) created by our sales managers and participating in virtual shows, special edition online magazines and events.
May 2nd, 2020: In lieu of the cancelled Great Alaska Gathering show, Alaska Skyways <[[https://www.alaskaskywaysmagazine.com/]]> magazine will publish a special digital magazine on behalf of the Airmen’s Association. Look for the BendixKing ad!
